bibl.title: The Tebtunis Papyri. Volume III, Part 2.

series.title: University of California Publications. Graeco-Roman Archaeology.

bibl.seg: Hunt Arthur S. †, J. Gilbart Smyly and C.C. Edgar, The Tebtunis Papyri. Volume III, Part 2. (University of California Publications. Graeco-Roman Archaeology. IV.)
Berkeley, University of California Publications - London, Cambridge University Press, 1938, 4°, xxiii-345 pp. et 4 pll.

C.R. par Paul Collart, REG 52 (1939) pp. 646-647; - RPhil 3e s., 14 (1940) pp. 273-274. - Sergio Donadoni, BSRAA 33 (1939) pp. 402-405. - Carlo Gallavotti, RivFil 18 (1940) pp. 149-150. - Heinz Kortenbeutel, DLZ 61 (1940) coll. 462-463; - OLZ 44 (1941) coll. 108-109. - Naphtali Lewis, Classical Weekly 32 (1939) pp. 222-223. - Orsamus M. Pearl, CP 37 (1942) pp. 225-227. - N.N. Pikus, VDI 19 (1947, fasc. 1) pp. 114-116. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 14 (1939) No. 28, pp. 386-393. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, GGA 202 (1940) pp. 74-95 (sur les noms propres); - PhilWoch 61 (1941) coll. 16-23. - T.C. Skeat, CR 53 (1939) pp. 218-219. - B.A. van Groningen, BibO 3 (1946) coll. 110-111. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 13 (1939) pp. 215-218. - Herbert C. Youtie, AJP 63 (1942) pp. 244-248. = Scriptiunculae. II (Amsterdam, 1973) pp. 776-781.
